elfWarrior.title: Elf Warrior
elfWarrior.text: As the name implies original idea was to re-imagine Elves of fables to a more grounded notion, with the addition of race mixes, though taking into consideration supernatural and physical description of this race. The result is a character with a military officer glance.

blocks.text: Modifications towards agile nature of the Elves and credibility of movement with the armor were a priority.
Absen of sleeves and tells somewhat of the climate, place the character resides in and personâ€™s taste - fancy sleeve on one side of the arm.
This character was optimized for game implementation. retopology, texturing, UV mapping except for rigging and animations are present in this model.
